Project Security

Use the Project Security dialog box to modify, create, duplicate, or delete Users, access list groups, and privilege sets in an access control database. You can enter this dialog box in one of three ways:

  • Admin | Security | Users
  • Admin | Security | Access List Groups
  • Admin | Security | Privilege Sets

Field Descriptions

Category drop-down list Select All Users, All Access List Groups, or All Privilege Sets to display all of the currently defined Users, access list groups, or privilege sets. When you make a selection, the tabs on the right change according to your selection.
Category list Displays the currently defined Users, access list groups, or privilege sets, depending on the item you selected from the category drop-down list.
Add, Duplicate, and Delete Buttons Use these buttons to create, duplicate, and delete Users, access list groups, or privilege sets in an access control database. The buttons that are available depend on the item you selected from the category drop-down list.
